title: Who Should Be a Guest on the Show? - The After Show
itunes:title: Who Should Be a Guest on the Show? - The After Show
description:
We drill down on question 20 from The Cigar Authority Survey. This question was not multiple choice, so we had a lot of different answers. Who are the guests that the listeners would like to see on The Cigar Authority?

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at https://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
